FuncDef:
The interval command configures the IFIT measurement interval.
The undo interval command restores the IFIT measurement interval to the default value. The interval command configures the IFIT measurement interval. The undo interval command restores the IFIT measurement interval to the default value. By default, the IFIT measurement interval is 60s. This command is supported only on the CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
IFIT measurement interval.
The value is an integer in the range from 10 to 3600. The default value is 60.

ExtraInfo: You can run this command to configure the IFIT measurement interval, which determines the time for switching the Loss-Flag and the interval for exporting the flow table.
